**Compact Mass Spectrometers Tender Announcement**

**Document Details**

* **Reference Number**: WS4218826617-Document4235651799
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4218826617
* **Issuing Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Procurement Overview**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites submissions for the procurement of compact mass spectrometers under solicitation number WS4218826617. This is a competitive, open-bidding tender.

**Key Dates**

* **Publication Date**: September 29, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 18, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* **Contract Start Date**: Expected to begin December 1, 2023

**Specifications and Requirements**

The requisitioned compact mass spectrometers must meet specific requirements as outlined in the procurement documents.

**Trade Agreements and Considerations**

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity and Delivery**

This tender is open to all qualified suppliers with the necessary expertise and equipment to perform the required tasks.

**Contact Information**

Queries and submissions should be directed to:
Chad Bellerdine, PSPC/SPAC
Email: [chad.bellerdine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chad.bellerdine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Note: There is no mention of the end-user entity (Canada Border Services Agency) in this version. The information should be saved for later review and possibly included in a supplementary document if necessary. 

**Notice and Attachments**

The full tender notice and associated documents are available online at:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17588545?extsite=MTc1ODg1NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
